EmailTemplate.name: Volunteer EOI Ops
EmailTemplate.subject: Correct Link to Apply as Volunteer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Oops! Unfortunately it seems there was an issue with the previous link we sent you. Please click on the following link https://www.campquality.org.au/article/524-register-broup-2017?First_Name={!Lead.FirstName}&Last_Name={!Lead.LastName}&EOIID={!Lead.ExternalID__c} to complete your application:
We look forward to receiving your application soon.
Kind Regards,
Your Camp Quality Team
